definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Objective To understand the status of perceiving of self-medication among university students.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解大學生自我藥療認知情況。

sentences.english: Sometimes CBT and medications are used in combination.
sentences.chinese: 有時候CBT和藥療被混合使用。

sentences.english: Today I'm on medication to control my emotional ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我用藥療來控制情緒上的起落。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of four-step acupuncture and medicine therapy for treatment of genual osteoarthritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察四步針藥療法治療膝骨性關節炎的療效。

sentences.english: Food is homologous with the birth of the medication.
sentences.chinese: 食療是與藥療同源誕生的。

definition: rich person's ailment (needing expensive treatment and long recuperation)

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4

definition: lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1

definition: see 郎格罕氏島|郎格罕氏岛[Lang2 ge2 han3 shi4 dao3]

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
